column4: I can not LOG OFF. Clicking SYSTEM - QUIT only closes all my windows and bring me up the GNOME DESKTOP MANAGER menu
Since nobody seems can help me, would someone just let me know if this Linux thinggy ubuntu has SYSTEM RESTORE feature
it's no "fix" but try this create a launcher add shutdown -f now  in the command section  - the f is force filesystem chek and s optional
desktop shortcuts can be dragged to the menu bar on the top and bottom of the screen. right click .. launcher   .. command .. "shutdown now" options -f filecheck -r reboot
